text:
The MIF renderer writes an invalid <ShapeRect> statement into the MIF: 

<ShapeRect 0.0 841.889 595.275 0.0>

whereas the MIF spec specifies this must be:

<ShapeRect Left Top Width Height>

for example:

<ShapeRect 20.0 20.0 595.275 841.889>

As a consequence, FrameMaker parses the MIF but the document is always empty.
creator: n.parker@wanadoo.fr
crnd.trainee1@st.com
text: the example examples/fo/basic/simple.fo create this problem

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: MIF output format is no longer maintained
batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
creator: gadams@apache.org
